Reviews.Title: Slow, clunky, and constantly stalling.
Reviews.Author: flhu
Reviews.Content: Slow, clunky, and constantly stalling. Windows 8 takes up over 50% of ram out of the box without anything else installed or running. I upgraded the memory to 16 gig, and that has helped a little, but the CPU is still too slow to handle a browser with 3 tabs open on pages that don't even have Flash. Movies stutter, pages load slow, page scrolling and typing buffers all the time. Sometimes I would think that it was maybe my internet connection, but my 5 year old Dell laptop, that despite having a slightly slow clock speed and was run over by a truck, still works better. I don't know how anyone can use this for even the most basic computational needs. Toshiba should offer a refund to anyone who has ever bought one of these.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: robert Todd Stoebener
Reviews.Content: If, you want a computer that stalls on the most basic tasks then, this is the computer for you.  I loved my last Toshiba however, I would not recommend this one to anyone.  Get one with much more power!

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD Dual-Core E-450 Accelerated Processor with AMD Radeon HD 6320 graphics
17.3" LED-backlit TFT high-definition widescreen display
Built-in high-definition webcam with microphone
1 USB 3.0 port and 2 USB 2.0 ports
Weighs 6.2 lbs. and measures just 1.3" thin
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite C875D-S7101 17.3" Laptop/4GB Memory/500GB Hard Drive/USB 3.0/HD Webcam/Satin Black
